ygData.subject: Re: Advise Needed
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the same problem.  I will be playing a character and think... wow.. an ogre shaman... hmm or something like that, and off I go to create an ogre
ygData.messageBody:
I have the same problem. I will be playing a character and think...'wow..
an ogre shaman... hmm' or something like that, and off I go to create an
ogre shaman. :P

That's how my SK got started.. but I like him, so he hasn't bit the dust..
actually, all of the people I have now, I like very much, so none of them
are gonna bite it.. lucky them ;)

----- Original Message -----
From: Brandon R. Veatch <lrddragn@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 9:25 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Advise Needed


> From: "Brandon R. Veatch" <lrddragn@...>
>
> Ping Pong? ping pong? My problem is more like the way a pinball does in
a
> pinball machine between the bumpers. I have been playing this game since
> around Beta 3 and I have NEVER had a character above level 20 because I
have
> never stuck with just one long enough to get there. I have about 9
> characters that are all in the teens. So I guess that makes me a
> characteraholic. Yeah...I feel your pain friend.
>
> Lrddragn,
> Various characters on Fennin Ro
> -----Original Message-----
> From: rich.hitz@... <rich.hitz@...>
> To: Shadowknight@onelist.com <Shadowknight@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, September 30, 1999 3:25 PM
> Subject: [shadowknight] Advise Needed
>
>
> >From: rich.hitz@...
> >
> >I am starting to have that itch again. I think I am not
> >enjoying my Troll anymore. Since I started playing my
> >Druid, I dread getting on as my troll. But I can't put
> >my finger on why. I haven't played Cronik in a week or
> >so.
> >I have /played my Druid for <14 hours and am 2 bubs into
> >6th level. I guess I have learned how to level rather
> >quickly with my class of choice. This may be slow to
> >some, but for me it is astronomically fast.
> >I am in the middle of a mental debate on whether or not
> >to scrap him, sell everything, run to my druid, die and
> >leave him a big inheritance.
> >Anyone else run into this problem of character ping-pong?
> >Things at home are also very stressed, so that isn't
> >helping either.
> >Thanks.
> >
> >--
> >Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
> >Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
> >15th Season Troll SK
> >Bertoxxulous
> >
> >>-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
> >-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
> >
>
> > -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
